name: Evaluatethemeasure
title: Evaluate the measure
description:
port for the given time period. If a report already exists for the subject and reporter for the given time period, it is updated.
Otherwise, a new report is created.

parameter.name: periodEnd
parameter.documentation: The end of the measurement period.

parameter.name: periodStart
parameter.documentation: The start of the measurement period.

parameter.name: report
parameter.documentation:
If report is true, then the created measure report will be created or updated in the system.  If report is false,
the computed MeasureReport will simply be returned to the caller.
